column4: I installed kubuntu Edgy two days ago on a laptop and I have noticed that if I do not login within a few minutes of starting the machine, the screen goes blank and I can't login except remotely
no, if that were true we would not be here
and you are implying that howtos are completely up to date
I have tried to find info on how to fix my problem with rt2500 on my own
I might be plain DUMB but I am not lazy
but most people won't help those who can just as easily help themselves
I have found that qtparted, though quite good, is not as good as PartitionMagic
Why is it not as good as PartitionMagic?
I could not move partitions with it and last month I just had to reinstall everything except for the XP partition
maybe I am just dumb though
By moving partitions do you mean resizing or what exactly?
